title: ACTREC Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Pharmacist Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has published the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Pharmacist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm and D.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the addre...
